data.title: Website of Uttarakhand government
meta_keywords: one stop source of government information
data.meta_description: National Portal of India provides a single-window access to information and services that are electronically delivered from all Government Departments, Institutions and Organizations. It has been a popular source of information to a wide range of stakeholders - from citizens, to government, business and Indian Diasporas. It is a gateway to access Indian Government websites at Centre, State and District levels.
data.text:
Uttarakhand state is rich in mineral deposits like limestone, marble, rock phosphate, dolomite, magnetite, copper, gypsum, etc. Users can get information about the state of Uttarakhand on this page. One can also find the online citizen services like Janadhar e-sewa, video conferences, passport status and commercial tax registered dealers status, etc. National news, recent updates, results, recruitments, tenders, gazettes and photo gallery are also available. One can get to know about various departments, important organizations, universities and institutes of Uttarakhand. Detailed...

Users can find information on the Uttarkashi district of Uttarakhand. Details related to the district's administration, health, education and citizens' services etc. are given. Information is also given on agriculture, industry, temples, flora and fauna, election etc. Maps of the district are also provided.

"The Uttarakhand Subordinate Service Selection Commission" published vide Notification No-181 / XXXVI (3) / 2014-39 (1) / 2014 dated June 24, 2014,under Article 200 of the 'Constitution of India'. Governor allowed Uttarakhand Act No. 20, 2014, to be served as a general information section that notification extraordinary legislative postscript -1 ( a) have been published.

The GoI established the National Rural Livelihoods Mission (NRLM) to implement the new strategy of poverty alleviation woven around community based institutions. The Missionâ€™s primary objective is to reduce poverty by promoting diversified and gainful self-employment and wage employment opportunities for sustainable increase in incomes.

The Tehri Garhwal district is located in the state of Uttarakhand. Users can find information about the district's administration, education, government colleges, climate, rivers, legends, temples and flora and fauna. Details of transport system and disaster management are provided.

Users can find information on the Udham Singh Nagar district of Uttarakhand. Details related to the district's administration, health, education and citizens' services etc. are given. Information is also given on agriculture, industry, temples, flora and fauna, election etc. Maps of the district are also provided.

Find contact details of Sanskrit Education Department of Uttarakhand. Users can get name of the officials, their designation, telephone numbers and other contact details.

Get details about the Chamoli District of Uttarakhand. Information about the historical back ground, culture, fair and festival are available. Users can get information about travel, tourism, forests, wildlife, etc. Details about PG Colleges in the city are also available. Users can get detailed information about the maps, police, excise office, District Magistrate etc.

Information about Champawat District of Uttarakhand. Get detailed on land records, treasury-ekosh, commercial tax, panchayat, transport, etc. Information about history, geography, district profile, district statistical view etc. are also available. Users can get details of schemes such as IAY, BPL, NREGA, etc. Information about RTI, telephone directory, cast certificate, etc are also given.

The Pithoragarh district is located in the state of Uttarakhand. Users can find information about the district's administration, education, government colleges, climate, rivers, legends, temples and flora and fauna. Details of transport system and disaster management are provided. Detailed information along with a route map is provided for the Kailash Mansarovar Yatra.

Information on Almora District of Uttarakhand is available. Details of schemes sanctioned to various departments are provided. Information related to the district's administration, recruitment, demography, tourism, cultural heritage, handicrafts, flora and fauna is available. Details of relief packages to victims are also given.

Get information on Bageshwar district of Uttarakhand. Information on recruitment is given. Users can view information about the district's location, area, festivals, agriculture, population, blocks and Tehsils etc. Detailed information pertaining to temples like the Ramji temple, Sitladevi temple and Hanuman temple is given. Details related to the transport and accommodation facilities are given.
